text: DXJS (837 kHz) Radyo Pilipinas is an AM radio station owned and operated by Philippine Broadcasting Service. The station's studio is located near the Provincial Capitol, Brgy. Telaje, Tandag.SOA on swine production launch in SurSurSOA post assessment seeks to improve program implementation Last January 6, 2011, DXJS's transmitter tower was knocked down by heavy rains.Flood update: of 25 dead nationwide, 17 in MindanaoNDRRMC UPDATE ==See also== *Radyo Pilipinas 1 738 *Radyo Pilipinas Stations ==References== Category:Radio stations established in 1995 Category:Philippine Broadcasting Service Category:People's Television Network Category:Radio stations in Surigao del Sur
title: DXJS
